title: The True Meaning of Christmas | Jay Bennett
description: I directed, produced and edited this music video for Jay Bennett, a London-based comedian.

title: I Trained like My Tyson for 24 Hours | ReadyMoneyTyrieq
description: I shot, directed and edited this YouTube video for "Ready Money" Tyieq, a London-based champion boxer.

title: Hometown Glory - The Crowning of A New Cruiserweight King In Front of 15,000 Fans! | Boxxer
description: I operated second camera for this promo on Boxxer, promoting Chris Billiam-Smith v. Mateusz Masternark

title: I Faked My Own Death | Like or Death | Channel 4 Documentaries
description: I assisted on the edit for one episode of “Like or Death”, a digital Channel 4 series documenting digital influencers who perform death-defying stunts or create generally dangerous content.

title: Four Strangers Have One LOVE ISLANDER In Common! Can They Guess WHO?! | It's Mutual | Channel 4.0
description: I edited two episodes of “It’s Mutual”, a digital Channel 4 game show series featuring contestants trying to guess a mutual friend. I also graded both episodes.

title: Can 4 Girls Guess Who They Rejected For A Cash Prize?! | It's Mutual | Channel 4.0
description: I edited two episodes of “It’s Mutual”, a digital Channel 4 game show series featuring contestants trying to guess a mutual friend. I also graded both episodes.

title: Hometown Glory - The Crowning of A New Cruiserweight King In Front of 15,000 Fans!
description: I shot MIV for a video promoting a December 2023 boxing match between Chris Billiam-Smith and Mateusz Masternak. The interview was with Billiam-Smith, who as of November 2023 is the WBO cruiserweight champion.

title: y Entire Face And Body Are Tattooed - Until Today | TRANSFORMED
description: I end-to-end edited and scripted this episode of “Transformed,” a Truly series that showcases people with unique and distinct styles undergoing a major makeover.

title: I've Been Stretching My 76mm Earlobes Since I Was 14 | HOOKED ON THE LOOK
description: I end-to-end edited and scripted this episode of “Hooked on the Look”, a Truly series that showcases people with unique and distinct styles.

title: Cosplay Saved My Life | SHAKE MY BEAUTY
description: I end-to-end edited this episode of “Shake my Beauty”, a Truly series that showcases people with unique and distinct styles, but with a more makeup/glam style than Hooked on the Look.

title: I'm 29 And Pregnant For The 9th Time | MY EXTRAORDINARY FAMILY
description: I end-to-end edited and scripted this episode of “My Extraordinary Family”, a Truly series that showcases quirky or unconventional families.

title: The Twin Sisters Who Share A Body | BORN DIFFERENT
description: I end-to-end edited and scripted this episode of “Born Different”, a Truly series that spotlights differently-abled people.

title: I Make ‘Spicy’ Content - What Will My Date Think? | DATING DIFFERENT
description: I end-to-end edited and scripted this episode of “Dating Different”, a Truly dating/matchmaking series.

title: A Night Of Partying Changed Our Lives Forever | LOVE DON'T JUDGE
description: I end-to-end edited and scripted this episode of “Love Don’t Judge”, a Truly series spotlighting unconventional couples and relationships.

title: Disinformation and Democracy (Part I) | People and Power
description: I associate-produced this two-part Al Jazeera special, which investigated the dissemination of misinformation around the time of major elections in 2016, 2017 and 2018, with a focus on Donald Trump’s 2016 presidential victory. Responsibilities ranged from post production responsibilities like assisting on editing and scripting; securing shooting locations and sourcing b-roll.

title: Disinformation and Democracy (Part II) | People and Power
description: I associate-produced this two-part Al Jazeera special, which investigated the dissemination of misinformation around the time of major elections in 2016, 2017 and 2018, with a focus on Donald Trump’s 2016 presidential victory. Responsibilities ranged from post production responsibilities like assisting on editing and scripting; securing shooting locations and sourcing b-roll.

title: King Size - Making No Sound
description: I shot, produced, directed and edited this music video for London-based band, King Size.

title: Dear Toxic Masculinity (explicit)
description: I shot, produced, gripped/lit, directed and edited this music video for London-based comedian, Tamar Broadbent.
